scripts.build: tsc && tsc-alias && mkdir -p dist/backend/resemblyzer && cp resemblyzer/*.py resemblyzer/requirements.txt dist/backend/resemblyzer/
scripts.install-resemblyzer: cd resemblyzer && python3 -m venv venv && venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ..
scripts.install-resemblyzer:railway: python3 -m venv /opt/venv && /opt/venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && /opt/venv/bin/pip install --no-cache-dir --extra-index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu -r dist/backend/resemblyzer/requirements.txt
scripts.dev: npm run install-resemblyzer && concurrently "node scripts/tunnel.js" "tsx watch -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts"
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
